reports_page.project_budget_vs_actuals_desc: An overview of budget consumption across all projects. This report includes all expenses ever linked to a project, regardless of the date range selected above.

en.title: Title
en.name: Name

phase1.title: Phase 1: Core Modules & Setup
phase1.objective: Build the foundation of the ERP, focusing on project, client, supplier, and employee management.

subtask1.title: Project Setup
details: Initialize Next.js and Firebase.
Configure ShadCN and Tailwind CSS.

subtask2.title: Project Management
details: Create, view, update, and delete projects.
View project details.

subtask3.title: Dashboard
details: Create a centralized dashboard showing key metrics.

subtask4.title: Client, Supplier, & Employee Management
details: Full CRUD modules for clients and suppliers.
Manage employee profiles.
Detail pages for each.
Ability to rate suppliers.

subtask5.title: Authentication & Authorization
details: Set up login, signup, and password reset flows.

phase2.title: Phase 2: Financials & Procurement
phase2.objective: Integrate core financial modules including invoicing, procurement, and an approval workflow.

subtask1.title: Financials Module
details: Implement a transaction ledger for tracking income and expenses.

subtask2.title: Account Management
details: Allow admins to manage company bank accounts.

subtask3.title: Invoicing Module
details: Create, send, and track client invoices.
Integrate paid invoices with the financials module.

subtask4.title: Procurement Module
details: Create and track purchase orders from request to receipt.
Integrate completed POs with financials.

subtask5.title: Approvals Dashboard
details: Create a centralized dashboard for managers to approve POs and material requests.

subtask6.title: Contract Management
details: Add contracts for both clients and suppliers.
Allow uploading and downloading of contract files.
Link transactions to contracts.

phase3.title: Phase 3: Inventory & Assets
phase3.objective: Build robust modules for tracking physical assets and inventory across different locations.

subtask1.title: Inventory Management
details: Track all materials, tools, and equipment.
Alerts for low stock and out-of-stock.
Ability to adjust stock levels.

subtask2.title: Warehouses & Categories
details: Allow admins to configure warehouses.
Allow admins to configure inventory categories.
Link inventory items to warehouses and categories.
Filter by warehouse and category.

subtask3.title: Material Requests
details: Allow teams to request materials from inventory for specific projects.
Integrate approved requests with inventory levels.
Manage requests on a dedicated page.

subtask4.title: Asset Management
details: Track high-value assets like vehicles and machinery.
Log purchase details and assign assets to projects.
Manage a complete maintenance history for each asset.

subtask5.title: Project Task Management
details: Implement a Kanban board for task tracking.
Allow assignment of tasks to team members.
Update task status via drag-and-drop.

phase4.title: Phase 4: User Experience & Administration
phase4.objective: Enhance usability with system-wide search and provide robust administrative tools.

subtask1.title: Global Search
details: Implement a global search bar in the header.
Search across all major modules (projects, clients, etc.).
Provide quick access to information.

subtask2.title: User & Role Management
details: Create a dedicated page for admins to manage users.
Ability to assign roles (admin, manager, user).
Restrict access to features based on role.
UI to view all users and change roles.

subtask3.title: Activity Log
details: Implement a global audit trail.
Log key events like project creation and transactions.
Provide a direct link to the relevant item.

subtask4.title: Company Settings
details: Allow admins to manage the company profile.
Upload and update company logo.
Configure company contact details.
Display information throughout the app.

subtask5.title: User Profile
details: Create a user profile page.
Ability to change password.
Toggle theme settings.
View linked employee details.

phase5.title: Phase 5: AI Integration
phase5.objective: Incorporate AI capabilities to provide actionable insights and automate complex tasks.

subtask1.title: Project Risk Analysis
details: Use AI to analyze project details and identify potential risks.

subtask2.title: Project Task Suggestions
details: Use AI to suggest a full task list based on project description.

subtask3.title: Client Interaction Summary
details: Generate an AI summary of a client's interaction log.

subtask4.title: Project Daily Log Summary
details: Use AI to summarize progress and sentiment from daily logs.

subtask5.title: Employee & Supplier Performance Summary
details: Generate performance summaries for employees based on their project involvement.
Generate summaries for suppliers based on order history and ratings.

subtask6.title: ISO 9001 Compliance Assistant
details: Create a dedicated page where users can describe their processes.
Provide AI-powered suggestions to improve ISO 9001 alignment.
Focus on feedback collection and continuous improvement.

subtask7.title: Employee Payroll
details: Implement payroll summary and one-click transaction creation.

phase6.title: Phase 6: Finalization & Polish
phase6.objective: Ensure the application is robust, user-friendly, and accessible to a wider audience.

subtask1.title: Internationalization (i18n)
details: Implement full support for both English and Arabic.
Translate all pages, components, and static text.

subtask2.title: Responsiveness & UI Refinement
details: Ensure the app is usable on all screen sizes.
Implement alternative mobile views for complex components like task boards.

subtask3.title: Reporting & Analytics
details: Create an interactive reports page.
Visualize financial performance, project profitability, and inventory status.
Allow filtering by date range.

subtask4.title: Quality Assurance
details: Fix bugs, improve performance, and address edge cases.

subtask5.title: Documentation
details: Create comprehensive README.md and DATABASE_SCHEMA.md files.

subtask6.title: Project Roadmap
details: Create a roadmap page to track project progress and celebrate completion.

material_requests.page_desc: View and manage all material requests from project sites.
material_requests.list_desc: A log of all created material requests.

en.iso_compliance_desc: Get AI-powered suggestions to improve your operations.
en.describe_erp_ops_desc: Provide a detailed description of how you currently use the ERP to manage projects, financials, inventory, and more. The more detail, the better the suggestions.
en.erp_ops_placeholder: Example: We use the system to track project budgets from start to finish. Purchase orders are created for major suppliers, but approved manually via email. Inventory is only updated when goods are received...
en.compliance_suggestions_desc: Here are some actions you can take to improve your operations and better align with ISO 9001 quality standards.
en.roadmap_desc: An overview of the key features developed for this project.
en.project_complete_desc: All core features have been successfully built. This system is ready for operations.
en.development_phases_desc: A breakdown of the features implemented across the development stages.

en.password_reset_desc: We recommend changing your password periodically.
